job.title: Software Engineer III: Frontend
job.description: Software Engineer III FrontendbrbrLogicGate is a venturebacked Chicagobased technology company that needs YOU to help us as we continue to disrupt the wide world of GRC governance risk and compliance At LogicGate youll join a group of bright welcoming people ready to learn grow and do the right thing for our customersbrbrWhat youd achievebrulliCollaborate with our friendly resourceful team as our 8th frontend developerliliWork closely with Design Product Management and other developers to implement new userfacing featuresliliHelp optimize our frontend application for speed reliability and scalabilityliliWrite tests to facilitate an efficient dev cycle and prevent the occurrence of bugsliliContribute to the continual improvement of our codebase and processes via thoughtful refactoring iteration and experimentationbrliulThe value youd bringbrulliYou want to invest in the growth of your fellow team members and are eager to share your knowledge while continuing to learn from othersliliYoure passionate about building creative scalable solutions to complex problemsliliYou enjoy working independently but are also happy to pair with others to provide or receive help as neededliliYoure looking for an environment where you will have the autonomy you need to do your best workbrbrliulstrongWhat We UsebrstrongulliBack Spring Boot Java KotlinliliFront TypeScript Angular Webpack SassliliData Neo4j Redis RabbitMQliliTest JUnit Jasmine Karma Protractor SeleniumliliOps AWS Ansible Terraform Hashicorp DockerliliWork Jira Slack Gitlab G SuitebrliulThis job is eligible for remote work in all states with the exception of ColoradobrbrstronguWhat We OfferustrongulliWork EnvironmentliulliRegular cadence of communication organizationwide like monthly All Hands meetingsliliHighly collaborative cross functional environment leveraging all the right tools no matter your locationliliCommitment to the growth of our employees through various frameworks including an Emerging Leaders Program liliSocial activities yes even remotely where we can come together and celebrate all that weve accomplished like an amazing anniversary party or talent showliulliTime Off 33 business days in first year of employmentliulli16 Days PTOlili9 Company Holidays Memorial Day Juneteenth Thanksgiving etc PLUS two floating holidays annuallylili6 Health Days Mental amp PhysicalliliEquitable Parental Leave Policy liulliHealthcareliulliBlue Cross Blue Shield for Medical Dental and Vision liliLogicGate covers 80 of employee premiumsliulliFlex RewardsliulliMonthly funds on Benepass debit card to be leveraged by the employee cell phone streaming services child care dog walker etcliulliPartial ownership of company through stock optionsbrliulHere are just a few things weve been up to recentlybrulliWeve secured 156M in total funding to help us continue our missionliliWe earned our placement as the 1 GRC Solution on the G2 Grid  an honor weve received many times overliliWe were included on BuiltIn Chicagos list of Best Small Companies to Work For in 2020  and Chicago Tribune Top Workplaces 2020brliulNot too familiar with GRC Thats oka lot of us werent when we were in your shoes either Heres what you need to knowbrulliGRC stands for governance risk management and complianceliliGRC professionals help their companies manage uncertainty act with integrity and stay on the right side of the law Bottom line they keep their companies on the right track liliGRC is a huge market and growing fast Not only is it a 35 billion industry today its predicted to grow to 64 billion by 2025 This is what were going afterbrliulLogicGate is continuing to hire with all interviewing and onboarding done virtually due to COVID19 All new and existing LogicGate employees will continue to work from home until its safe to return to our offices When our offices reopen we will provide the choice to work from home or return to work in an office unless a job requirement makes it necessary for a particular role to be performed at a LogicGate officebrbrBIRemotebrbrLogicGate is dedicated to creating a community of diverse professionals as we believe this creates a strong sense of belonging which ultimately enables our business to succeed We are passionate about creating safe inclusive spaces for all those who come through our doors Were proud to be an equal employment opportunity employer who does not discriminate on the basis of race gender sexual orientation gender identity age national origin disability religion veteran or military status or any other protected statusbrbrPowered by JazzHRbrbrybDZWwuDI2
